title: Bike Check: Freddy Ovett and His Specialized S-Works Crux At the UCI Gravel World Championship
content:
This Specialized Crux is ready for the ever-changing terrain of the UCI Gravel World Championship 2023 in Italy.

Read the full article at Bike Check: Freddy Ovett and His Specialized S-Works Crux At the UCI Gravel World Championship on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
